attributes.additional_details: Explain all these things that increasingly concern us  - not least a government that acts with terrifying intent. Explain how Govt can allege chemtrails are a “rumour” when everyone can now see  a pilot skywriting LAST CHANCE with his chemtrail over New York at 30,000ft. (Google Last Chance Chemtrail to SEE the RUMOUR (!) video) Explain how that is possible with  a ‘contrail!’ Explain obvious government obscurantism when challenged, by persistently insulting OUR intelligence. Explain why poisonous matter is needed for ‘climate control’ by these ‘rumoured’ jet planes. Explain why we should not believe this is POPULATION control and not the alleged  CLIMATE control when we are sprayed with toxic biological matter, barium and other poisons. Explain why when cloud cover keeps heat IN, how it is supposed to cool the earth. Explain why we have had a silent spring as the birds stay away or die. Explain why the list of bacteria and toxic substances in the spray is vast.
